description.text: Protocol for telling which is the primary display among the selection of enabled outputs.
description.summary: expose which is the primary display

description.text: Specifies which output is the primary one identified by their uuid. See kde_output_device_v2 uuid event for more information about it.
description.summary: Provide the current primary output's name
